thread.section_title: Eclipse Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eclipse Travel | www.eclipsetravel.com.au
thread.title: Mrs Rita Shepherd
thread.title_full: Eclipse Travel reviewed by Mrs Rita Shepherd

author: Mrs Rita Shepherd
title: Mrs Rita Shepherd
text:
In December 2016- January 2017, my husband and I had a fabulous 5 week trip to South America. Our agent was Richelle who was efficient, friendly, professional and an excellent communicator. We were asked about the standard of accommodation we wanted and what we wanted to do and then the trip was organised for us.Apart from the things we knew about, Eclipse recommended and organised a range of interesting experiences that really added to the trip.
Documentation we received with our itinerary was clear and detailed and the emergency contacts provided were very reassuring. The companies they subcontract to in South America are very professional and reliable. Accommodation chosen for us was excellent. It was always central which allowed us to explore on foot.
Overall Eclipse is a company we have recommended to our friends and we would certainly use again.
